thread.title: Man United injury news: Jose Mourinho fears Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick will miss EFL Cup final | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United injury news: Jose Mourinho fears Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick will miss EFL Cup final | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United injury news: Jose Mourinho fears Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick will miss EFL Cup final | Metro News
text:
Search Metro Follow us Jose Mourinho fears Manchester United duo Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick will miss EFL Cup final after Europa League injuries Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 7:24 pm Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho (Picture: Getty) 
Jose Mourinho fears Manchester United duo Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick will miss the EFL Cup final after hobbling off in the Europa League. 
Armenian forward Mkhitaryan fired the Red Devils in front in United’s second leg against St Etienne, but soon after was forced off with a hamstring problem . Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
Carrick then left United fans sweating after leaving the field while pointing to the back of his leg and heading straight down the tunnel for treatment. 
When asked about the influential pair’s injuries, Mourinho said: ‘You can be injured leaving your house. You never know when and why. 
‘It’s the result of so many matches. This is always a risk. When someone is missing, it is an opportunity for someone else. Henrikh Mkhitaryan was struggling with a hamstring problem (Picture: Getty) 
‘Not to have them both for the final is complicated as they’re important players.’ 
Mourinho was asked to confirm whether the players were ruled out of Sunday’s final against Southampton and replied: ‘I don’t say that, I just say what I feel.
